intro: Psychotria nubica, commonly known as the cloud forest psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the montane rainforests of Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and produces clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found at higher elevations. Psychotria nubica is also noted for its role in supporting local biodiversity, particularly in cloud forest ecosystems.
